DOC.brief_summary: A comparative study will be conducted and the patient will undergo a conventional urodynamic study. In order to successfully determine if the Peritron+ is capturing vesical pressure measurements consistent with conventional urodynamics the two sources of Pves will be collected concurrently.
DOC.criteria: Patients normally indicated for urodynamic evaluation Patients who suffer from bladder infections Patients who suffer from strictures in the urethra
